content: this is a good project for using your left over yarn you could probably use any type of yarn with any sized hook - as long as you keep your stitches tight it s a fun way to keep your things nice and tidy for anyone interested in how i did the stripe instructions can be found here http //peneknitcrochet blogspot com/2011/09/crochet-diagonal-stripe-colour-changes html update 21 02 2013 after a few requests i have started making a video tutorial for these please bare with me as it will take me some time i will post it to my blog once it s done thanks for your patience update 27 08 2013 turns out making a video tutorial is very time consuming and i haven t been able to get it done but i have been able to make a photo tutorial for the set up of the case find it here http //peneknitcrochet blogspot com au/2013/08/hook-monster-photo-tutorial html
